subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The Government of Suriname lays heavy emphasis on the protection and promotion of human rights. Suriname has signed and acceded to most of the important international and regional human rights treaties and declarations. The project aims to build capacity of government and non government actors to meet treaty obligations, draft/implement policy amd raise awareness on human rights issues more broadly.  Under the project training sessions will be done for government and non government actors and assistance will be provided to the government in reporting on Human Rights obligations.
subproject.title: Promoting Human Rights

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project will support strengthening of the legal aid system, public education and awareness, as well as enhance proper monitoring and managing processes towards improving the mechanisms for protecting and promoting the human rights of the citizens of Suriname.
subproject.title: Promoting Legal Access

subproject.description: This Project will support the Government’s efforts to prevent, detect and manage corruption through enhanced understanding of corruption and the fundamental institutions and transparency and accountability measures needed for the prevention and management of corruption.
subproject.title: Combatting Corruption

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Adequate human resource capacity and coordination mechanisms for efficient management and timely implementation of activities under the full project (Human Rights, Legal Access and Anti Corruption)
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Program Management

title: Legal Access, Human Rights and Anti-Corruption
